column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh: According to an infomercial in ------Rasmei Kampuchea------
column5: Royal Enfield motorcycles will soon open a sales branch in Phnom Penh.------First produced in 1901
column6: Royal Enfield is the oldest motorcycle brand in the world still in production
column7: with the Bullet model enjoying the longest motorcycle production run of all time.------First produced in Reddich
column10: with all components made there from 1962.------Royal Enfield are sold in 600 exclusive stores and more than 45 locations in------major cities such as Milwaukee
column24: Ho Chi Minh City and Hanoi.------They will be available in Phnom Penh soon through a dealership partnership with  TF Motors.
